about_the_game:
Welcome to the exciting world of cute cartoon cats! Get ready for an exciting adventure in the 'Find the Differences' genre, where 42 levels of exciting challenges await you. Each level represents two similar images with six differences to find.

What makes this game special? Each kitty has a unique profession or hobby, from doctor and engineer to rock musician and blogger. You will enjoy the simple and pleasing visuals and accompanying music that will immerse you in the atmosphere of the game.

This game is suitable for both adults and children, and will be a great way to spend your time in a fun way. Immerse yourself in the fascinating world of professional cats and develop your skills of observation and attention. Purchase this game right now and immerse yourself in the exciting world of 'Cast Cats'!

Features:

  • 42 levels + 1 secret level
  • Cats!
  • Pleasant musical accompaniment
  • Casual gameplay
  • Mouse control
  • The game is suitable for children and adults
  • No penalties for mistakes and no time limit, play as you feel comfortable

name: Cast Cats

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-Bit or Newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6400, AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 660, AMD Radeon R9 270X
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-Bit or Newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8600, AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 1660, AMD Radeon RX 5500 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space

short_description: Welcome to the exciting world of cute cartoon cats! Get ready for an exciting adventure in the 'Find the Differences' genre, where 42 levels of exciting challenges await you.
